hints.content:
$\blueD{150}$ is the smallest whole number that rounds to $200$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 100 to 300 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 100, 150, 200, and 300 are labeled. The tick mark for 150 is blue. !

hints.content:
$\blueD{249}$ is the greatest whole number that rounds to $200$.

[[☃ image 1]]

So, any whole number from $\blueD{150}$ to $\blueD{249}$ rounds to $200$.

options.alt: A number line labeled 100 to 300 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 100, 150, 200, 249, and 300 are labeled. The tick marks for 150 and 249 are blue. !

A number line labeled 100 to 300 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 100, 150, 200, 249, and 300 are labeled. The tick marks for 150 and 249 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 150 to the tick mark at 249. !

question.content:
**Which number line highlights all whole numbers that round to $200$ if we are rounding to the nearest hundred?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 100 to 300 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 100, 150, 200, 240, and 300 are labeled. The tick marks for 150 and 240 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 150 to the tick mark at 240.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/61bd798c470902d68dd89911bfd0ba8b3993bb95)

![A number line labeled 100 to 300 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 100, 150, 200, 249 and 300 are labeled. The tick marks for 150 and 249 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 150 to the tick mark at 249.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/995087dcb1ea5f22fa15c047542731f7271dc2a3)

![A number line labeled 100 to 300 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 100, 200, 299, and 300 are labeled. The tick marks for 200 and 299 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 200 to the tick mark at 299.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d78f6c60d74dccc9b7c30fb4b60d6d46c0c151e0)
